import turtle

# Set up the turtle screen
screen = turtle.Screen()

# Set up the turtle
river = turtle.Turtle()
river.speed(10)
river.color('blue')

# Draw the river
river.penup()
river.goto(-300, -100)
river.pendown()
river.goto(300, -100)

# Exit the screen when clicked
screen.exitonclick()
